attributes.action: Allow Ilker Ozbey - Husband to a British citizen and father to a newborn British child to be granted a UK visa to see his son and his wife.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ilker Ozbey is the wife of Kimberley Ozbey and a father to a one week old newborn child. The British government have refused him a visa TWICE and he now looks certain to be called up for his national service with the Turkish army.
If this is the case, he will not be able to see his child and wife for at least another two years and that is providing that he is granted a visa by our government.
My MP David Clellend has refused to help me as he does not know who I am and the only person to show some support is George Galloway, MP.
Please sign!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
